title: Programmer
about: Full-Stack fan. My previous career as a university lecturer in electronics and computer science at Halabja University showed my strong interest in mechanical processes, problem solving and creating quality products through teamwork. I specialize in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and React on the front-end as well as Node/Express and Mongo on the server to build beautiful and secure apps.
degree: bachelor's and master's degrees in electronics and microelectronics.
position: University Lecturer in electronics and computer science
subject1: Theory of electricity and magnetism for the Faculty of Physics
